company_context: Bilingual, tax-compliant POS system targeting small independent restaurants and retailers in Canada.

priority_tiers.tier_name: Owners and Top Decision Makers in Small Independent Restaurants and Retailers Canada
priority_tiers.tier_description: This tier targets the most influential business leaders such as owners, founders, cofounders, and presidents. These individuals have the authority to make purchasing decisions for small independent restaurants and retailers, making them the highest priority for direct outreach.

queries.description: Owners of restaurants in Canada
Owners of retail businesses in Canada
Founders of restaurants in Canada
Founders of retail businesses in Canada
Cofounders of restaurants in Canada
Cofounders of retail businesses in Canada

Presidents of retail businesses in Canada

priority_tiers.tier_name: General Managers Operations Directors and Senior Managers Canada
priority_tiers.tier_description: Focuses on senior operational roles such as general managers, operations managers, store managers, and managing directors. These roles are important as they influence day-to-day operations and can be key advocates for the POS system within the business.

queries.description: General managers of restaurants in Canada
General managers of retail businesses in Canada
Operations managers of restaurants in Canada
Operations managers of retail businesses in Canada
Store managers of retail businesses in Canada
Managing directors of restaurants in Canada
Store owners across Canada - includes smaller independent stores

priority_tiers.tier_name: Technology and Finance Decision Makers Canada
priority_tiers.tier_description: Targets individuals responsible for technology, finance, and purchasing decisions including IT managers, finance managers, purchasing managers, and controllers. This tier is critical for selling a POS system given their involvement in system selection and financial approvals.

queries.description: IT managers for restaurants in Canada
IT managers for retail businesses in Canada
Finance managers for restaurants in Canada
Finance managers for retail businesses in Canada
Purchasing managers for restaurants in Canada
Purchasing managers for retail businesses in Canada
Controllers for restaurants in Canada
Controllers for retail businesses in Canada

usage_instructions: Start outreach efforts prioritizing Tier 1 to engage owners and founders directly for maximal decision-making influence.
Use Tier 2 queries to identify senior operational managers who may champion the POS system internally.
Target Tier 3 decision makers for technology and finance who influence purchasing and implementation details.
Each query is designed to yield 100+ leads; outreach should be performed in small daily batches for quality engagement.
Filter searches further by Canadian cities or provinces like Toronto, Montreal, Vancouver to localize campaigns when needed.
